div.p: The following examples are MedicationDispense resources for Oral Dosage Forms that reference Medication Resources for a manufactured product:

li.a: Dispense for Oral Chemotherapy - Capecitabine (RxNorm code)
Dispense for Oxycodone (RxNorm code) - PRN dose with dose range, coded additional instructions and PRN coded pre-condition
Dispense for Prednisone (RxNorm code) Tapering Dose - entered-in-error with multiple DosageInstruction lines that include coded additionalInstructions and multiple EventHistory elements
Dispense for Percocet (NDC Code) - in-progress with additionalInstructions, and as needed dosage with condition
Dispense for Over the Counter medication - Tylenol PM (NDC code) - on hold with as needed dosage with a condition, a dose Range and an Event History
Dispense for Alprazolam (Rx Norm code) - in progress
Dispense for Azithromycin (NDC code) - completed with multiple dosage lines
Dispense for Warfarin 5mg (NDC Code) where the product is dispensed as multiple strengths based on prescribe dosage
Dispense for Warfarin 2mg (NDC Code) where the product is dispensed as multiple strengths based on prescribe dosage

div.p: The following examples are MedicationDispenses resources for Oral Dosage Forms that include a Medication Code

li.a: Dispense for Levothyroxine (NDC code) in-progress with authorizing prescription
Dispense for Azithromycin (RxNorm Code) - in-progress with coded additionalInstructions
Dispense for Dilantin Oral Suspension (NDC code) - completed
Dispense for Busulfan (Myleran) - completed
Dispense for Vicodin - in progress - PRN with pre-condition

div.p: The following examples of MedicationOrder resources for Injectable Dosage Forms that reference a Medication Resource for a manufactured product:

li.a: Dispense for IV Antibiotic - in progress - Vancomycin IV (NDC Code) - in-progress

Dispense for Subcutaneous injection with multiple dosage lines - Insulin - Novolog (NDC Code) - active - includes Destination, Receiver, note. DosageInstruction includes additionalInstructions as text
Dispense for Intravenous Antibiotic with a Dosage Rate - Piperacillin (NDC code) - completed with a coded site and route of administration and a rate expressed as a ratio
Dispense for Intravenous Chemotherapy (inpatient order) - Alemtuzumab (RxNorm Code) - completed with multiple dosageInstruction lines
Dispense for Lorazepam (Rx norm code) - completed with rate range
ispense for Brentuximab Vedotin (NDC code) - IV Chemo - stopped
